TextView.android:text:
Step 1: Go to Main menu where you can see bunch of Icon.

Step 2: Rates can't update from main menu.

Step 3: Connect to Internet.

Step 4: Click any icon in main menu Eg.Vegetables then you will see blank activity with [Not Availabel] text.

Step 5: Now Go to Option Menu there will see [Updates rates],Click it! Now App will connect to Server dont touch to screen untill it finish itself.

Step 6: Again go to Main menu to refresh App.

Step 7: Now click to any icon to get latest and daily rates.


Note: Once you Update rates,it updates rates of vegetables,Exchange and Petroleum rates. 

 Thank you,
 Injoy using Smart Nepal.

 Your feedback is highly appreciated.
